Body:
X, y, neighbors, distances, _, _ = example_estimate_competence
query = np.atleast_2d([1, 1])
ds_test = BaseDS(create_pool_classifiers, with_IH=True, IH_rate=0.1)
ds_test.fit(X, y)
neighbors = neighbors[(index), :]
distances = distances[(index), :]
ds_test._get_region_competence = MagicMock(return_value=(distances, neighbors))
ds_test.predict_proba_with_ds = MagicMock(return_value=np.atleast_2d([0.25,
    0.75]))
proba = ds_test.predict_proba(query)
assert np.allclose(proba, np.atleast_2d([0.25, 0.75]))
pytest.mark.parametrize('index', [0, 1, 2])
